{"id":929014925,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"8 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1680781491,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/929014925/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"7.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(string a, string b) {\n        int m = a.size();\n        int n = b.size();\n        int dp[m + 1][n + 1];\n        for(int i=0;i<=m;i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<=n;j++){\n                if(i == 0){\n                    dp[i][j] = j;\n                } else if(j == 0){\n                    dp[i][j] = i;\n                } \n                else if(a[i - 1] == b[j - 1]){\n                    dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j - 1];\n                } else{\n                    dp[i][j] = 1 + min(min(dp[i][j - 1], dp[i - 1][j]), dp[i - 1][j - 1]);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return dp[m][n];\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
